de.arnomann.martin.jta.api.entities

Interface Stream

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDable<Long>, Updatable

    public interface Stream
extends Updatable, IDable<Long>
    Represents a live stream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Channel getChannel()
      Returns the streaming channel.

      Returns the game of the stream.
      UpdateAction<Long> getViewers()
      Returns the viewer count.
      java.time.LocalDateTime getWhenStarted()
      Returns when the stream started.
      void startAd(AdLength length)
      Starts an ad in this stream.
